text:
University of Florida / UF Health | Gainesville, Fl | Full-time (full benefits) | $70-76k

Web Developer (back-end)

Looking for a web programmer to join our full-service web team. We maintain many of the public and internal websites and web applications for our non-profit university and hospital system.

Ideally speaking, you will have excellent PHP skills, are easy-going but driven to make great things, and play nice with others in the sand box. Icing is having experience working with open source CMS' like WP and Drupal, excited about the future of JS frameworks, and really enjoying solving random problems.

http://explore.jobs.ufl.edu/cw/en-us/job/495547/web-develope...
